snippet: The Department of Veterans Affairs will propose new regulations to make it easier for veterans to receive treatment for illnesses linked to traumatic brain injury.
abstract: The Department of Veterans Affairs will propose new regulations to make it easier for veterans to receive treatment for illnesses linked to traumatic brain injury.
lead_paragraph: New regulations proposed by the Department of Veterans Affairs will make it easier for thousands of veterans to receive health care for certain illnesses that have been linked to traumatic brain injury, wrote James Dao of The New York Times.

headline.main: Rules Eased for Veterans’ Brain Injury Benefits
